Segment.name: BCD
Segment.comment: To transmit identifying dates and numbers for the transaction set and indicate the monetary value to the receiver of the transaction

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: CreditDebitAdjustmentNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by issuer of a credit or debit memo

Field.name: TransactionHandlingCode
Field.comment: Code designating the action to be taken by all parties

Field.name: CreditDebitFlagCode
Field.comment: Code indicating whether amount is a credit or debit

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: VendorOrderNumber
Field.comment: Number assigned by a vendor referencing a particular customer purchase order

Field.name: Date3
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PurchaseOrderNumber
Field.comment: Identifying number for Purchase Order assigned by the orderer/purchaser

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: TransactionTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of transaction

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

SyntaxNote.name: R071014
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of BCD07, BCD10 or BCD14 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: P1314
SyntaxNote.comment: If either BCD13 or BCD14 is present, then the other is required.
